article.name: Snowboard !
article.description:
Its a snow boarding game. Well, its not a snowboard game, its just this weird snowboardy thing, that says Anny for some unknown reason.
Anyhow, use the left and right arrows to steer the board around the slope. Customise your board by typing in something at the top left.
The game kinda ran into the ground tho when I messed up on the jumps. I couldn\'t get it to jump properly. My gravity skills aren\'t brilliant!
article.keywords: gravity, snowboard, powerpuff, snow, boards, trees, alpine, flash, macromedia, game, anny, anzas.
